name: Ghost Town Plus
overview: Visit the mysterious Ghost Town, a place full of unexpected dangers and hidden treasures! Ghost Town is a fantastic adventure written by Udo Gertz and released in 1985 for the Commodore C16, C116 & Plus/4. It was one of my favorite games when I was a kid and I never managed to beat the game. 35 years later I uncovered every single mystery hidden inside the Ghost Town. An extended version of the 1985 hit game re released in 2020 for machines equipped with 64k of RAM. new title screen 3 languages built in: English, German and Hungarian improved in game graphics tons of bug fixes Search the treasure of the Ghost Town and open it! Kill Belegro, the wizard, and dodge all other dangers. Don't forget to use all the items you'll find during your journey through 19 amazing hires-graphic-rooms! Enjoy the quest and play it again and again...
